Headline: Loop-bound Pink, Green, Orange Bound trains bypassing Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink, Green, Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Clark/Lake due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink, Green, Orange Line trains are running, but not stopping at Clark/Lake due to police activity.

 For access to trains on the Loop "L", use the State/Lake station 1 block east of Clark/Lake or the nearby Clinton station. Personnel are on the scene and updates will follow shortly. We do apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience.  For further assistance, see station personnel.

Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/ Marquette
ShortDescription: #94 South California buses are temp rerouted in both directions via California, 63rd, Western, 67th and California then resume their normal route on California

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 63rd, Western, 67th and California then resume their normal route on California due to police activity near California/ Marquette

Allow extra travel time.
